title: Why Trains Crash
text: Creating an account is free and gets you: Access to High-Definition streaming A personal area on the site where you can access: Favorite Shows Viewing History Early access to exciting new features By creating an account, you acknowledge that PBS may share your information with our member stations and our respective service providers, and that you have read and understand the Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.
